subject: p14841168
History: W PMH of morbid obesity, ESRD on HD, pulmonary hypertension home 2L O2, DM, dCHF, and prior DVTs on Coumadin with likely panniculitis, s/p debridement, Interval assesment Interval assesment.
Impression: ET tube tip is 35 cm above the carinal. NG tube tip passes below the diaphragm terminating in the stomach. Cardiomediastinal silhouette is unchanged.
